QuestData.Title: Pale Moonlight
QuestData.Description: We are getting strange reports of an orc attack on a nearby draenei settlement called Eventide Landing.$b$bI'm hearing these particular orcs are unlike any we have encountered before.$b$bThey seem... sickly, and are pale in color.$b$bThe locals could use our help, commander. This seems like the perfect opportunity to test our garrison's capabilities.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Gnaw Bloodseeker and $2oa Pale Devourers.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you see the pale orcs, commander?
QuestData.RewardText: This is unnerving to say the least.$b$bThose things must have come from underground.$b$bHopefully we have seen the last of them.
